mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance_management ( working_date, start_time, end_time ) VALUES ( BINARY_TO_EUC(#{attendance_management.working_date.workingDate.workingDate}), BINARY_TO_EUC(#{attendance_management.start_time.startTime.startTime}), BINARY_TO_EUC(#{attendance_management.end_time.endTime.endTime}), )
